value: SUITE 303B LEVEL 3 31 MARKET STREET, SYDNEY, 2000, NSW, Australia

4731 - Arrangement of Transportation of Freight and Cargo Summary > NEOPOST SHIPPING HOLDING PTY LTD is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover arrangement of transportation of freight and cargo. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. NEOPOST SHIPPING HOLDING PTY LTD is headquartered in Sydney, New South Wales. It is headed by director Aaron Gutherie Bryson Everingham. For the 2023 financial year, the company's net loss totalled $60,000. NEOPOST SHIPPING HOLDING PTY LTD forms part of the transportation, communications, electric, gas, and sanitary services industry sector.
